trans-unit.source: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa un elemento de leyenda, que está almacenado en la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item:
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> clase representa un elemento de leyenda, que puede ser una instancia predeterminada o elemento personalizado:

trans-unit.source: Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de leyenda predeterminados se insertan automáticamente en la leyenda de la serie de datos o puntos de datos.

trans-unit.source: Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series.
trans-unit.target: Entradas de manera predeterminada para los gráficos circulares y de anillos representan los puntos de datos trazados, mientras que las entradas de todos los demás tipos de gráfico representan la serie trazada.

trans-unit.source: By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, estas entradas de leyenda utilizan el color de punto o una serie de datos para el color del símbolo y el nombre de la serie o punto de datos para el texto del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de leyenda predeterminados se pueden personalizar o eliminar en tiempo de ejecución mediante el uso del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> eventos de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: Elementos de leyenda personalizados tienen texto definido por el usuario, color de símbolo y así sucesivamente.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data.
trans-unit.target: A diferencia de las entradas de manera predeterminada, no están conectados con los datos trazados.

trans-unit.source: Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Se pueden agregar elementos de leyenda personalizados en tiempo de diseño o tiempo de ejecución, mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Símbolos de leyenda pueden ser rectángulos, líneas o marcadores, dependiendo de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> configuración de la propiedad de un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The text of a custom legend item is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El texto de un elemento de leyenda personalizado viene determinado por la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este constructor para crear e inicializar una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> clase.

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> collection property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que también puede agregar elementos de leyenda personalizados mediante el `Add` y `Insert` métodos asociados a la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> propiedad de colección de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Nombre del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The color of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Color del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Ruta de acceso de la imagen que se va a mostrar para el elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> class with the specified name, color and image path.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> con el nombre, el color y la ruta de acceso de la imagen especificados.

trans-unit.source: Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified.
trans-unit.target: Solo el `image` o `color` parámetro debe especificarse.

trans-unit.source: If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Si se especifican ambos, el `image` parámetro tiene prioridad.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la orientación para el degradado de fondo de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Also determines whether a gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: También determina si se usa un degradado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Una enumeración de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle" /> que especifica la orientación del degradado de fondo de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> propiedad para determinar si un título mostrará un degradado, y se utiliza determinar la orientación del degradado si uno.

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo se implementa si la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> propiedad está establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de modelos disponibles, consulte el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors:
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar colores de degradado:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> propiedad para establecer el color principal.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> propiedad para establecer el color de la base de datos secundaria.

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: Utilícelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> propiedad para establecer el estilo de degradado deseado.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el estilo de sombreado de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Una enumeración de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle" /> que especifica el estilo del sombreado de un elemento de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeración especifica el patrón de trama utilizado por un pincel de tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
trans-unit.target: El patrón de trama está compuesto de un color de fondo sólido y las líneas dibujadas sobre el fondo.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista de los estilos de sombreado disponibles, consulte el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El color de las líneas de sombreado está determinado por la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un color que se reemplazará con un color transparente al dibujar la imagen del fondo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> valor que se mostrará como transparente cuando se dibuja la imagen de fondo.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color secundario de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que se usa para el color secundario del fondo con relleno sombreado o degradado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> propiedad es una de las propiedades relacionadas que determinan el color de fondo secundario de muchos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objetos; se usa cuando se están aplicando los colores de degradado.

trans-unit.source: This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo se implementa si la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> propiedad está establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Rectangle>.

trans-unit.source: You can set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Puede establecer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> en cualquier valor ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: If hatching is used, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Si se utiliza sombreado, la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> propiedad determina el color de las líneas de sombreado para el elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background:
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar colores de degradado de fondo de una celda de leyenda:

trans-unit.source: To use gradient colors:
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar colores de degradado:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> propiedad para establecer el color principal.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> propiedad para establecer el color de la base de datos secundaria.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> propiedad para establecer el estilo de degradado deseado.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color del borde de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the border color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> utilizado para dibujar el color del borde de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El color predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Puede establecer esta propiedad en cualquier valor ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: If you use a marker for a custom legend item.
trans-unit.target: Si usa un marcador para un elemento de leyenda personalizado.

trans-unit.source: this property will set the border color of the marker.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad establece el color del borde del marcador.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property is also set, its value has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, si la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> también se establece la propiedad, su valor tiene prioridad.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el estilo del borde de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle" /> que determina el estilo del borde del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the line style used for a border.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad determina el estilo de línea utilizado para un borde.

trans-unit.source: The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: La línea puede ser sólida, de puntos y así sucesivamente.

trans-unit.source: For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.
trans-unit.target: Para otros estilos de borde, consulte el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> tema de enumeración.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el ancho del borde de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.
trans-unit.target: Un <see langword="integer" /> valor que determina el ancho, en píxeles, del borde del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderWidth%2A> property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line> style.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderWidth%2A> propiedad también puede utilizarse para establecer el ancho de líneas cuando, por ejemplo, se muestran los elementos de leyenda personalizados con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line> estilo.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenga en cuenta** esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de celdas del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection" /> object that represents the collection of cells in the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection" /> que representa la colección de celdas en el elemento de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object and stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Un elemento de leyenda consta de una o más celdas de leyenda, cada uno representado por un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objeto y se almacenan en un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that is used to draw the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que se utiliza para dibujar el elemento de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El color predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Esto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> propiedad es de uno varios relacionados con propiedades que obtiene o establece el color de muchos elementos del gráfico; se puede establecer en cualquier valor ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul).

trans-unit.source: If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence.
trans-unit.target: Si esta propiedad se establece para un punto de datos y su serie, el color del punto de datos tendrá prioridad.

trans-unit.source: The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color.
trans-unit.target: El color de la serie solo podrá utilizarse para puntos de datos que no se definen su propio color.

trans-unit.source: If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color.
trans-unit.target: Si un elemento de leyenda personalizado utiliza un marcador, esta propiedad determina el color del marcador.

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property is set, its value then has precedence.
trans-unit.target: Sin embargo, si la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> propiedad se establece su valor, a continuación, tiene prioridad.

trans-unit.source: This property will be ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad se omitirá si el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> propiedad especifica una imagen que se usará para el símbolo de elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una marca que indica si el elemento de leyenda está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el elemento de leyenda está habilitado; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la imagen que se mostrará para un símbolo de elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="string" /> que representa la dirección URL de un archivo de imagen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: This property determines the image file to be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> symbol.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad determina el archivo de imagen que se usará para la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> símbolos.

trans-unit.source: The path can be an absolute or a relative URL.
trans-unit.target: La ruta de acceso puede ser absoluta o una dirección URL relativa.

trans-unit.source: If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: Si establece una imagen de fondo, esa imagen se mostrará con independencia de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> configuración de la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> propiedad para habilitar un color utilizado por la imagen aparezca transparente.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el estilo de presentación de la imagen de elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle" /> enumeration value that specifies the display style of the legend item image.
trans-unit.target: Valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle" /> que especifica el estilo para mostrar de la imagen del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Estos estilos determinan cómo se mostrará el símbolo correspondiente del elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line> style can be combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Marker> style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line> estilo puede combinarse con un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Marker> estilo.

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, first set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line>.
trans-unit.target: Para lograr esto, establezca primero la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> propiedad <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle.Line>.

trans-unit.source: Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property to specify a marker image, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to specify a marker style.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> propiedad para especificar una imagen de marcador o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> propiedad para especificar un estilo de marcador.

trans-unit.source: The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker.
trans-unit.target: El símbolo resultante será una combinación de una línea y una imagen o un marcador.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object associated with this legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> asociado a este elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> object associated with this legend item.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend" /> objeto asociado a este elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color del borde de los marcadores, si se usan.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa el color ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) de un borde de marcador.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, establezca la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> propiedad en un valor distinto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que los marcadores no se aplicará a circular, anillos y cualquier apiladas tipos de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: For custom legends, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property will also set the border color of markers.
trans-unit.target: Para las leyendas personalizadas, la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> propiedad también establecerá el color del borde de los marcadores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property setting has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> configuración de la propiedad tiene prioridad sobre la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> configuración de la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el ancho del borde de los marcadores, si se usan.

trans-unit.source: Measured in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Se mide en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the border width of the markers.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="integer" /> que representa el ancho del borde de los marcadores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is one (1) pixel.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es de un (1) píxel.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de los marcadores, si se usan.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the color of the markers.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa el color de las marcas.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: El color predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a marker image of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una imagen de marcador de posición del elemento de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the URL of an image file.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="string" /> que representa la dirección URL de un archivo de imagen.

trans-unit.source: Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL.
trans-unit.target: Representa una ruta de acceso a un archivo de imagen, que puede ser una dirección URL absoluta o relativa.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, establezca la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> propiedad en un valor distinto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> propiedad tiene prioridad sobre la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
trans-unit.target: Una imagen de marcador puede ser cualquier archivo gráfico válido compatible con .NET Framework, incluidos los iconos.

trans-unit.source: To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para establecer un color de la imagen de marcador para que sea transparente, utilice la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un color que se reemplazará con un color transparente cuando se dibuje la imagen del marcador.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa un color ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) que se va a reemplazar con un color transparente cuando se dibuje la imagen del marcador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> propiedad se utiliza para seleccionar un color en una imagen de marcador que se mostrará como transparente.

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Puede establecer esta propiedad en cualquier valor ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tamaño de los marcadores de elemento de leyenda, si se usan.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Expresión <see langword="integer" /> que representa el alto y el ancho del área de trazado de marcadores, en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es 5 píxeles.

trans-unit.source: To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: Para usar marcadores, establezca la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> propiedad en un valor distinto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.

trans-unit.source: Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types.
trans-unit.target: Tenga en cuenta que los marcadores no se aplicará a los puntos de datos de gráfico circular, de anillos y de cualquier tipo de gráfico apilado.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un estilo de marcador de elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
trans-unit.target: También se usa para habilitar o deshabilitar la presentación de marcadores.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle" /> integer enumeration that specifies a legend item marker style.
trans-unit.target: Enumeración <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle" /> expresada en enteros que especifica un estilo de marcador de elemento de la leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: To disable markers, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.
trans-unit.target: Para deshabilitar los marcadores, establezca esta propiedad en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle.None>.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="string" /> que representa el nombre del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color del separador de elementos de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que se usa para dibujar el color del separador de elementos de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el estilo del separador de elementos de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle" /> enumeration value that specifies the separator style of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle" /> que especifica el estilo del separador del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series" /> asociada a un elemento de leyenda predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="string" /> que determina el nombre de la serie asociada a un elemento de leyenda predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es una cadena de longitud cero.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad sólo debe usarse en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> evento, para determinar qué serie de datos representa un elemento de leyenda predeterminados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> propiedad se aplica a todos los gráficos excepto los gráficos circulares y de esfera; sus elementos de leyenda predeterminados corresponden a puntos de datos trazados y no a la serie trazada.

trans-unit.source: When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se trabaja con gráficos circulares y de esfera, utilice la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> propiedad en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no debe establecerse por el desarrollador.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint" /> object associated with a default legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el índice de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint" /> asociado a un elemento de leyenda predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="integer" /> que representa la ubicación del punto de datos asociado de la leyenda predeterminada en un índice de base cero.

trans-unit.source: All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Todos los tipos de gráfico, salvo los gráficos circulares y de anillos, devolverán menos uno (-1).

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad sólo debe usarse en el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> evento para determinar la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objeto representado por una entrada predeterminada leyenda de gráfico de circular o de esfera.

trans-unit.source: Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points.
trans-unit.target: Tipos de gráfico no sea circular o gráficos de esfera devolverá negativo uno (-1), puesto que los elementos de leyenda predeterminados corresponden a trazar series y puntos de datos trazados no.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property for these chart types.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> propiedad para estos tipos de gráficos.

trans-unit.source: This property should not be set by the developer.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad no debe establecerse por el desarrollador.

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de sombra de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa el color de sombra de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.
trans-unit.target: El color predeterminado es <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Black" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el color de sombra de varios elementos de gráfico y se pueden establece en cualquier valor ARGB (alfa, rojo, verde, azul) válido.

trans-unit.source: The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
trans-unit.target: El valor alfa se puede utilizar para lograr un efecto sombreado "realista"; Intente utilizar un color de "128,0,0,0" para las sombras.

trans-unit.source: To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Para implementar una sombra, establezca el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> propiedad en un valor distinto de cero (0).

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenga en cuenta** esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el desplazamiento de sombra, en píxeles, de un elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="integer" /> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="integer" /> que representa el desplazamiento de sombra, en píxeles, del elemento de gráfico relevante.

trans-unit.source: To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: Para implementar el sombreado, use un valor distinto de cero (0).

trans-unit.source: A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
trans-unit.target: Un valor positivo producirá una sombra que se desplaza hacia abajo y a la derecha.

trans-unit.source: A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.
trans-unit.target: Un valor negativo producirá una sombra que se desplaza hacia arriba y hacia la izquierda.

trans-unit.source: **Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.
trans-unit.target: **Tenga en cuenta** esta propiedad solo es aplicable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objetos que tienen un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.SeriesSymbol> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType.Image>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la información sobre herramientas del elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see langword="string" /> que representa la información sobre herramientas para el elemento de leyenda.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad le permite establecer palabras clave especiales para mostrar diferentes tipos de datos relacionados con el gráfico.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [palabras clave [rs_vsDataVis]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8a19d422-4eee-45ff-a5c3-feff7b76fa8c).

trans-unit.source: This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad es aplicable a toda la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
